role.descr: cause of nerves, nervous about/at what?

example.name: all args, example 1
example.text: She is nervous about climbing Everest.

example.name: all args, example 2
example.text: He is nervous at the prospect of failing math again.
example.arg: at the prospect of failing math again

example.name: nervous system
example.text: The human nervous system is capable of a wide range of functions.
